price: Dan jika Kami rasakan kepadanya kebahagiaan sesudah bencana yang menimpanya, niscaya dia akan berkata, "Telah hilang bencana-bencana itu daripadaku"; sesungguhnya dia sangat gembira lagi bangga,
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَقۡنَٰهُ نَعۡمَآءَ بَعۡدَ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ ذَهَبَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتُ عَنِّيٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَفَرِحٞ فَخُورٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wala-in adhaqnāhu naʿmāa baʿda ḍarrāa massathu layaqūlanna dhahaba al-sayiātu ʿannī innahu lafariḥun fakhūrun
